# TabletopInteraction.HoverAlignmentSource.base

**Case**

The bottom face of the object (the face parallel the XZ plane with lowest value of Y)

## Declaration

```swift
case base
```

## Alignment sources

- **TabletopInteraction.HoverAlignmentSource.baseOrTop**: Either the top or bottom face (one of the two faces parallel to the XZ plane)

items.description: Either the top or bottom face (one of the two faces parallel to the XZ plane)
